column4: hi all. trying to setup a samsung ml-1520 printer under latest ubuntu. total linux noob so no experience at all. can someone help me out?
found this page, not sure what to do with it: http://www.openprinting.org/printer/Samsung/Samsung-ML-1520
make sure cups is running, then visit http://localhost:631 in your favorite web browser.
sorry, I'm not familiar enough yet with ubuntu's service scripts to answer that one well.
